Gubernur Khofifah Minta Korban Ambruk Sekolah Terima Trauma Healing
06 Nov 2019, 08:38 by Anik Hasanah


Gubernur Khofifah Minta Korban Ambruk Sekolah Terima Trauma Healing

KBRN, Surabaya : Gubernur Jawa Timur Khofifah Indar Parawansa meminta agar para korban selamat SDN Gentong Kota Pasuruan yang ambruk mendapatkan pendampingan trauma healing dan trauma counseling. Menurutnya mereka tetap membutuhkan pendampingan secara  psychosocial agar mereka kelak tak mengalami trauma saat kembali menjalani kegiatan belajar mengajar di kelas. Hal itu disampaikan Khofifah usai melakukan kunjungan ke RSUD Soedarsono Pasuruan tempat para siswa korban selamat dirawat dan menjalani pengobatan.Pasalnya, dari kunjungan tersebut, beberapa orang tua wali murid menyampaikan bahwa anak-anak mereka mengalami trauma. Oleh karenanya Khofifah ingin oleh para psikolog para siswa juga mendapatkan pendampingan trauma healing dan trauma counseling. "Kita memberikan kewenangan pada Pemerintah Kota Pasuruan untuk melakukan indentifikasi adakah anak-anak yang masih memiliki trauma, pasca ambruknya SDN Gentong, sekolah mereka," kata Khofifah, dalam siaran pers, Rabu (6/11/2019).Para siswa yang mengalami trauma harus mendapatkan penanganan yang tepat. Jangan sampai kejadian ini justru akan membuat mereka trauma dan memiliki ketakutan saat kegiatan belajar mengajar di kelas. Menurutnya pendampingan oleh para psikolog akan berdampak baik karena mereka bisa menggali informasi yang dibutuhkan dengan cara-cara yang tak membuat siswa kembali merasakan trauma. Tidak hanya itu, mantan Menteri Sosial RI ini juga menegaskan bahwa seluruh korban SDN Gentong yang ambruk dan dirawat di rumah sakit tidak boleh dipungut biaya. Khofifah menyebut semua biaya pengobatan dan perawatan korban menjadi tanggungan pemerintah. Hal tersebut sudah ia komunikasikan bersama Kepala Dinas Kesehatan Provinsi Jawa Timur, dan juga jajaran terkait di Pemerintah Kota Pasuruan. Dengan harapan, para korban tidak lagi terbebani dengan pikiran biaya rumah sakit setelah tertimpa musibah."Dari sisi medik, saya sudah sampaikan  Kadinkes Provinsi Jawa Timur yang hari ini bersama saya ke Rumah Sakit untuk memastikan bahwa semua korban yang dirawat di RS tidak boleh dikenakan biaya. Semua biaya ditanggung pemerintah," tandasnya.Selain menjenguk para siswa korban selamat dari ambruknya SDN Gentong Pasuruan, Gubernur Khofifah juga menyempatkan diri takziah ke kediaman duka dari IA (8) siswa kelas 2 dan SAW (19) guru pengganti di SDN Gentong. Diiringi tangis haru keluarga yang ditinggalkan, Khofifah mengajak para pelayat untuk berdoa bersama. "Tentu atas nama kita semua, kita turut berduka cita atas meninggalnya ananda IA dan juga guru pengajar SAW. Kita berdoa semoga keduanya dipanggil di sisi Allah dalam keadaan husnul khotimah. Keluarganya dibeti kesabaran, ketabahan dan ikhlas," pungkas Khofifah.

Governor of Khofifah Asks School Collapsed Victims to Receive Trauma Healing
Nov 6 2019, 08:38 by Anik Hasanah


Governor of Khofifah Asks School Collapsed Victims to Receive Trauma Healing

KBRN, Surabaya: East Java Governor Khofifah Indar Parawansa requested that the survivors of SDN Gentong Pasuruan City who collapsed receive trauma healing and trauma counseling assistance. According to him they still need psychosocial assistance so that they will not experience trauma when they return to teaching and learning activities in class. This was conveyed by Khofifah after a visit to the Soedarsono Pasuruan Regional Hospital where survivors were treated and treated. Because, from the visit, several parents of parents said that their children were traumatized. Therefore Khofifah wanted by the students psychologists to also get trauma healing and trauma counseling assistance. "We give authority to the Pasuruan City Government to identify whether there are children who are still traumatized, after the collapse of SDN Gentong, their school," Khofifah said in a press release on Wednesday (6/11/2019). must get the right handling. Do not let this incident will only make them traumatized and have fears when teaching and learning activities in class. According to him, mentoring by psychologists will have a good impact because they can dig up the information needed in ways that do not make students feel traumatized again. Not only that, the former Indonesian Minister of Social Affairs also emphasized that all victims of the Gentong Elementary School that collapsed and were treated in hospitals should not be charged. Khofifah said that all medical expenses and care for victims were the responsibility of the government. He has communicated this with the Head of the East Java Provincial Health Office, as well as related officials in the Pasuruan City Government. With hope, the victims will no longer be burdened with the thought of hospital costs after a disaster strikes. "From the medical side, I have conveyed the Head of the East Java Provincial Health Office, who today is with me to the hospital to ensure that all victims treated at hospitals must not be charged All costs are borne by the government, "he said. In addition to visiting the surviving students of the collapsed SDN Gentong Pasuruan, Governor Khofifah also took the opportunity to take part in the mourning residence of IA (8) grade 2 students and SAW (19) substitute teachers at SDN Gentong. Accompanied by the tears of the families left behind, Khofifah invited the mourners to pray together. "Of course, on behalf of all of us, we are sorry for the death of IA and the teacher teacher SAW. We pray that both of them will be called in the sight of Allah in the state of Husnul Khotimah. His family is covered with patience, fortitude and sincerity," concluded Khofifah.
